text:
Joe Jackson was laid to rest in a private funeral yesterday afternoon at Forest Lawn in Glendale, California. But the famous family couldn't stop feuding long enough to let their patriarch rest in peace!

RadarOnline.com can exclusively reveal that superstar Janet, 52, and her niece Paris, 20, refused to speak and kept far away from each other during the services.

"Paris was almost unnoticeable at the funeral, and chose to stay away from her father's siblings," a source told RadarOnline.com. "She was definitely frosty."
title: Jackson Family Feud Explodes At Patriarch Joe's Funeral
